蒤蒤蒤

蒤字的基本解释

蒤
tú
虎杖，一种草本植物，高约一米，茎中空，表面有红紫色斑点，根入药。亦称“花斑竹根”。
杂草。

蒤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tú］
［《廣韻》同都切，平模，定。］
(1)草名。
(2)秽草。

蒤字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蒤； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1049第02
【玉篇】達胡切，音塗。【爾雅·釋草】蒤，虎杖。【註】似紅草而粗大，有細刺，可以染赤。【本草】一名苦杖。又名斑杖、酸杖、大蟲杖。　又【爾雅·釋草】蒤，委葉。【疏】穢草也。

蒤字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蒤字的起名意思

暂无。

Praise
Basic explanation of words
Praise
tú
Polygonum cuspidatum, a herbaceous plant, is about one meter high, with hollow stems and red-purple spots on the surface. The roots are used as medicine. Also known as "Diagraminum Root".
Weeds.
Praise
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tú］
["Guangyun" are cut in the same way, flat mold, fixed. ]
(1) Cursive name.
(2) Foul grass.
Praise
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Words] 　蒤; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1049 Page 02
[Jade articles] Dahuqie, sound painting. 【Erya·Shucao】Zao, Polygonum cuspidatum. [Note] It looks like red grass and is thick, with fine spines, which can dye red. [Materia Medica] A bitter stick. Also known as spot stick, acid stick, big insect stick.　[Erya·Shicao] Zhan, Wei Ye. 【Sparse】Foul grass also.
